meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>marrow</kanji> of a <kanji>god</kanji> contains their <vocabulary>essence</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>spirit</vocabulary>. I don't know how you found that out, it was probably really dangerous. You shouldn't mess with gods.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
